participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Introverted yet playful, enjoys deep conversations but can be blunt at times.
participant_1.background: I walk dogs for a living. My parents taught me survival skills. I'm an avid kayaker. I enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, loves meeting new people and sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: I also have a dog walking business. I've three dogs. I like to watch the Olympics. I am in an open polyamorous relationship. My father was a door-to-door salesman.

content.text: Hi how are you today how are you doing tonight?
I am good. Are you in school?
I'm in college too. What do you do?
I work at the animal shelter.
So you are saying that you are a animal
